title: Why was my account banned?
body: Riot gave no clarification to my ban

replies.body: What does it say when you log in?
Says account suspended. I went to my email and nothing there. No chat logs when i log in either

Zezockary is pretty much spot on in regards to what it means. 

Just in case  if you didn't have a link to player support: https://support.riotgames.com

They don't send emails for suspensions anymore.

It is probably because someone tried to hack your account or it is because of a chargeback. Make a support ticket and they will get you sorted out.
Ah, you are the troll on the forums?
